abstract: Goldenvoice, owner of Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, announces joint venture with Hangout Music Festival in Gulf Shores, Ala; deal indicates growing marketing clout of festivals.
lead_paragraph: Goldenvoice, the organizer of the annual Coachella music festival in California, has entered into a joint venture with the Hangout festival in Alabama.
snippet: Goldenvoice, the organizer of the annual Coachella music festival in California, has entered into a joint venture with the Hangout festival in Alabama.

keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Coachella Organizers in Deal With Hangout Music Festival
headline.print_headline: Pop Music Festival in Partnership Deal
